      • getHexString

        public static java.lang.String getHexString(byte[] raw,
                            boolean addSpaces)
        Turns a byte array into a human-readable hexademical string.
        Parameters:
        raw - The byte array to transform
        addSpaces - if true, adds a space after each hex couplet. Sometimes this can increase readability.
        Returns:
        Hex string version of the byte stream

      • hexStringToByteArray

      • FixDESParity

        public static byte[] FixDESParity(byte[] keyValue)
        FixDESParity This method will correct parity on a DES key. Luna HSMs require that DES keys have correct parity (i.e. the total number of bits in each byte must be odd, with the LSB being the parity bit). This is not an enforced condition in all other security providers. This method is provided for convenience to aid in importing a DES key from another provider into the Luna hardware.
        Parameters:
        keyValue - RAW bytes of the DES key to fix
        Returns:
        Parity corrected key bytes

      • getEncodedDigest

        public static byte[] getEncodedDigest(byte[] b,
                      int off,
                      int len,
                      java.lang.String digestAlg)
                               throws LunaException
        Generates an encoded ASN.1 digest of the given message, using the given digest algorithm.
        Parameters:
        b - The message to digest
        off - Offset in the message array to begin digesting
        len - Length of data to digest
        digestAlg - The digest algorithm to use
        Returns:
        An ASN.1 encoded DigestInfo structure
        Throws:
        LunaException - exception
